what: Screen titles and abstracts with OpenAI’s GPT models
title: Vignette for chat and set_api_key functions
text: function takes data frame study details, constructs prompt study, sends OpenAI’s GPT-3.5-turbo model, default, response. function returns tibble original study details model’s response.

previous_headings: Screen titles and abstracts with OpenAI’s GPT models
title: Vignette for chat and set_api_key functions
text: data: data frame containing study details. row represent study must ‘title’ ‘abstract’ columns. prompt: string prepended study details form prompt model. model: string specifying model use. Default “gpt-3.5-turbo”.

title: Vignette for chat and set_api_key functions
code: prompt <- "Is this study about a Functional Family Therapy (FFT) intervention?" loaded_objects <- load("./data/filges2015_dat_modified.rda") data <- get(loaded_objects) chat(data, prompt, model = "gpt-3.5-turbo")

text: function sets API key CHATGPT_KEY environment variable. environment variable set, prompts user enter API key.
